value.0:
This book describes the material components needed to cast certain Arcane spells. Components marked with {f} are not consumed in the casting most of the time. Occasionally, the power of the spell destroys the focus component. The chance of this increases with the difficulty of the spell. The term "plus" is used to separate two distinct components.

<ci i>Acid Fog</c>:  Powdered Peas and Animal Hoof
<ci i>Animate Dead</c>:  BlackOnyx (500gp)
<ci i>Bull's Strength</c>:  Bull Hair
<ci i>Bigby's Clenched Fist</c>: (f) Leather Glove
<ci i>Bigby's Crushing Hand</c>: (f) Leather Glove <c¥¥ >plus</c> Egg Shell 
<ci i>Bigby's Forceful Hand</c>: (f) Leather Glove
<ci i>Bigby's Grasping Hand</c>: (f) Leather Glove
<ci i>Bigby's Interposing Hand</c>: (f) Leather Glove
<ci i>Cat's Grace</c>: Cat Fur
<ci i>Chain Lightning</c>: Silver Pins <c¥¥ >plus</c> Fur and Silver Rod

<ci i>Clairaudience and Clairvoyance</c>: (f) Small Horn
<ci i>Color Spray</c>: Multicolored Sand
